subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. finals have been shockingly one-sided, with the Spurs relying on lethal shooting and talented role players to put the defending champion Heat on the verge of being dethroned.
snippet: The N.B.A. finals have been shockingly one-sided, with the Spurs relying on lethal shooting and talented role players to put the defending champion Heat on the verge of being dethroned.
